title: Brown Butter Vinaigrette
directions: To make the vinaigrette, in a saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter. When the butter is melted, reduce the heat to medium-low and simmer gently, swirling the pan often, until the butter is browned and smells nutty, about 10 minutes. Let cool to room temperature.
In a blender, mix together the brown butter, shallot, garlic, mustard and vinegar. Mix in the oil slowly to emulsify.Season to taste with salt and pepper.
ingredients: kosher salt and freshly ground pepper
